title: Charlotte McKinney is radiant as she plays up her supermodel figure in stripes for bash
text:
Charlotte McKinney was radiant as she celebrated a skincare clinic on Friday.

The 26-year-old swung by the Kate Somerville Clinic, which was celebrating 15 years at its Melrose Place location in Los Angeles.

Sweeping her signature blonde hair over her head, Charlotte played up her supermodel figure in a tight dress with floral stripes.

Fabulous Friday: Charlotte McKinney swung by the Kate Somerville Clinic, which was celebrating 15 years at its Melrose Place location in Los Angeles

Fashion details: The turtleneck number featured a thigh slit that allowed her to flash a bit of leg and show off her high leather boots. She accessorized with a sleek color-block handbag and added a touch of dazzle to the ensemble with an ornate pair of earrings

The turtleneck number featured a thigh slit that allowed her to flash a bit of leg and show off her high leather boots as she sat down.

She accessorized with a sleek color-block handbag and added a touch of dazzle to the ensemble with an ornate pair of earrings.

Charlotte, who became a sensation four years ago during a sizzling Super Bowl ad for Carl's Jr., got to pose up with Kate herself at the bash.

When you got it: Sweeping her signature blonde hair over her head, Charlotte played up her supermodel figure in a tight dress with floral stripes

The model got candid about her own skincare preferences during an interview about her beauty regiment in Life & Style magazine last year.

'I’m extremely cautious about my skin and sun protection, which is why sunscreen is so important to me,' said the Orlando-born fashion plate.

'My way to solve the summer glow look is that I have a natural base spray tan once a week at my home,' she revealed.

Top brass: Charlotte, who became a sensation four years ago during a sizzling Super Bowl ad for Carl's Jr., got to pose up with Kate herself at the bash

The Baywatch and Flatliners actress shared that 'Dr. Barbara Sturm Anti-Aging Body Cream really makes a difference with my skin.'

Charlotte dished: 'I find it at Violet Grey on Melrose Place in Los Angeles and I use it all over, all year round. I highly recommend it!'

She also said: 'Shiseido Synchro Skin Tinted Gel Cream SPF 30 is the perfect natural finish cream for my skin. It gives me that golden glow all year round with SPF.'
description: Charlotte McKinney was radiant as she celebrated a skincare clinic on Friday.
